mapper.update: update tbl_board_reply set br_content = #{br_content}, br_updateTime = sysdate where br_no = #{br_no}
mapper.select: select br_no,b_no, br_content,id,br_regTime,br_updateTime from (select /*+index(tbl_reply idx_reply) */ rownum rn, br_no,b_no,br_content,id,br_regTime,br_updateTime from tbl_board_reply where b_no = #{b_no} and br_no > 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(br_no) from tbl_board_reply where b_no = #{b_no}
